Forged from the streets of Berlin in 2012

Standert is now a well-established cycling brand, widely known for its commitment to craftsmanship, product design, and passion for cycling.

As a rider-owned and led company, Standert is dedicated to redefine modern cycling by creating high-quality bicycles that combine the heritage of aluminium and steel with state-of-the-art performance technology.

The company has in the last years rapidly grown into a dynamic startup with big ambitions of challenging status quo by fostering an innovative, dedicated and creative culture.

“We build bikes that we want to ride ourselves.”

This Berlin-based brand began in 2012 with Max von Senger, a product design student and bike messenger passionate about cycling's balance between effort and exhilaration. Inspired by the aesthetics of bicycles and elements of culture, fashion, and streetwear, Max built his first bike while at Universität der Künste.
